    • Method Detail

      • checkClaimable

        boolean checkClaimable(java.lang.String userLoginName,
                       java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> userRoles,
                       java.util.UUID taskId)
        Permission required: Read BpmTask
        Returns:
        True if: - userLoginName is the same with task owner, - or userRoles and task candidateGroups have common elements. - user has permission of MODIFY BpmTask.candidateRoles False otherwise
        Throws:
        vn.tki.erp.cambpm.exception.BpmAuthorizationException - if not authorized
        vn.tki.erp.cambpm.exception.BpmProcessEngineException - if fail

      • claimTask

        void claimTask(java.util.UUID taskId,
               java.lang.String assignee)
        Permission required: MODIFY task owner
        Parameters:
        taskId - task id to claim
        assignee - Login name of the user who will be assigned given task id
        Throws:
        vn.tki.erp.cambpm.exception.BpmAuthorizationException - if not authorized
        vn.tki.erp.cambpm.exception.BpmProcessEngineException - if fail
